def_en: If you do something without a second thought, you do it without thinking about it carefully, usually because you do not have enough time or you do not care very much.
If you have second thoughts about a decision that you have made, you begin to doubt whether it was the best thing to do.

def_cn: 转念间，经过重新考虑后(突然改变主意)
def_en: You can say on second thoughts or on second thought when you suddenly change your mind about something that you are saying or something that you have decided to do.
